role.title: Existing Role to use. The Role must be in the same namespace.

rules.title: List of RBAC rules assigned to the new Role.

deployment.title: Annotations to add to the Deployment

service.title: Annotations to add to the Service

runAsUser.title: User to be used for running the container.

enabled.title: Add necessary annotations for Prometheus Service Discovery.

path.title: URI path used for scraping. Defaults to /metrics.

port.title: Port used for scraping. Defaults to the application port.

minReplicas.title: Lower limit for the number of replicas to which the autoscaler can scale up.

maxReplicas.title: Upper limit for the number of replicas to which the autoscaler can scale up.

nodeSelectorTerms.description: A node selector terms, associated with the corresponding weight.

weight.description: Weight associated with matching the corresponding nodeSelectorTerm, in the range 1-100.

preference.description: A node selector term, associated with the corresponding weight.

KubernetesName.$comment: running `kubectl create secret generic invalid_name` will print this regex

NodeSelectorRequirement.description: A node selector requirement is a selector that contains values, a key, and an operator that relates the key and values.

key.description: The label key that the selector applies to.

operator.description: Represents a key's relationship to a set of values. Valid operators are In, NotIn, Exists, DoesNotExist. Gt, and Lt.

values.description: An array of string values. If the operator is In or NotIn, the values array must be non-empty. If the operator is Exists or DoesNotExist, the values array must be empty. If the operator is Gt or Lt, the values array must have a single element, which will be interpreted as an integer. This array is replaced during a strategic merge patch.

NodeSelectorTerm.description: A null or empty node selector term matches no objects. The requirements of them are ANDed.
